alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hancock; Coastal Washington (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 03 at 3:52AM EST until January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: * WHAT...Minor splash-over and beach erosion is likely around the time of high tide around 10:30 AM this morning. * WHERE...Coastal Washington and Coastal Hancock Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to noon EST today. High tide is around 10:30 AM today. * IMPACTS...Minor splashover is possible along some coastal roads at the time of high tide. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Panty Lane 1 MLLW Categories - Minor 19.9 ft, Moderate 22.9 ft, Major 25.9 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 8.5 ft, Moderate 11.5 ft, Major 14.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/11 AM 14.9 3.5 2.0 4 None 03/11 PM 13.1 1.7 2.0 3 None 04/11 AM 14.9 3.5 2.0 2-3 None 05/12 AM 12.6 1.2 1.6 4 None 05/12 PM 13.8 2.4 1.3 4-5 None Panty Lane 2 MLLW Categories - info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
